pythagoras.f

Class Circle

  • java.lang.Object
    • pythagoras.f.AbstractCircle
      • pythagoras.f.Circle
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, ICircle

    public class Circle
extends AbstractCircle
implements Serializable
    Represents a circle on a plane.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
